title: COVID Tyranny Returns | Guests: Sean Davis & Jason Whitlock | 11/18/20
description:
A special “guest” reveals what the pope’s been liking on social media. Breitbart senior tech correspondent Allum Bokhari breaks down the big revelations from the Senate’s Big Tech hearing with the CEOs of Twitter and Facebook. The Federalist co-founder Sean Davis talks the slimming chances that anything will come out of John Durham’s investigation into the Russia probe. California Gov. Gavin Newsom was caught at a crowded dinner party, and California State Assemblyman James Gallagher talks holding him accountable for abusing his power in more ways. Congresswoman-elect Nicole Malliotakis discusses the red wave of women entering Congress to fight socialism. Outkick writer Jason Whitlock warns of a trend in black churches toward Marxism and black pride.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
itunes:subtitle: Governors ramp up their coronavirus restrictions again and California Gov. Gavin Newsom was caught at a crowded dinner party.
